title: Actors who could play League champs
body:
This has probably been done a trillion times, but I like imagining what actors would play what champions if a live action League....thing...was ever made. 

Elizabeth Banks - Lux
Wesley Snipes - Lucian
Christina Hendricks - Sona
Zoe Saldana - Karma
John Hamm - Jayce
Scarlett Johansson - Miss Fortune
Emilia Clarke - Janna
Eva Green - Elise/Morgana
Olivia Wilde - Sivir
Jason Momoa - Sion
Rhona Mitra - Fiora


Keep it going!

replies.body:
Jackie chan - Lucian.
Tom Cruise - Cho'gath.
Ellen Page - Leblanc
Ben Stiller - Garen.
Jessica Biel - Akali.
Will Smith - Graves.
Sharlto Copley - Karthus.
Jennifer Lawrence - Syndra.
Matt Damon - Heimerdinger.
Bernie Mac - Ezreal.
George Clooney - Malzahar.
And Justin Bieber - Lee Sin.

Why would you not make Scarlett Johansson, Lux, and Christina Hendricks MF/Kat. 

I can see why you're not a casting agent.

PS. Jason Mamoa would be WAY better as Tryndamere.

David Williams - Wukong
p!nk - Blood Moon Elise
